turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Government of Moscow.
turn.1: What is the capital of Moscow?
turn.2: Government of Moscow The Government of Moscow () is the highest executive body of state authority of Moscow.
turn.3: Who is the head of the government?
turn.4: The Government of Moscow is headed by the highest official of the city of Moscow, i.e. the Mayor of Moscow.
turn.5: Who are the members of the government?
turn.6: The members of the Government of Moscow are the Mayor of Moscow, the Deputy Mayors of Moscow in the Moscow Government and the Moscow Government ministers.
turn.7: What is an example of an order the government has issued?
turn.8: The Government of Moscow issues orders (orders of the Government of Moscow) that are signed by the Mayor of Moscow.
turn.9: Does the government have legal personality?
turn.10: The Government of Moscow has legal personality.
turn.11: What is the structure of the government?
turn.12: Structure and functioning of the Government of Moscow are established by the law of Moscow, adopted by Moscow City Duma.
